name: Arcane Leviathan
description: The Arcane Leviathan is a massive construct characterized by its magical nature and imposing presence. It has an impressive swimming speed and is designed to act as a powerful guardian or weapon. It is capable of inflicting devastating electrical attacks.
memorable: Renowned for its immense size and magical capabilities, the Arcane Leviathan is resistant to many common attacks and possesses a variety of damaging abilities, making it a formidable opponent.
goals: Often serves as a guardian for its creator, protecting key locations or treasures.
relations: Typically created and controlled by a specific creator or mage.
environment: Frequently found in aquatic environments, utilizing its swimming speed.
strengths: Resistant to multiple damage types and conditions, with abilities that enhance its durability in combat.
weaknesses: Poor dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks requiring agility.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with devastating melee claw and slam attacks, as well as range lightning bolt strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Pylon Discharge unleashes a surge of lightning damage over a large area, effectively damaging multiple foes and blinding them.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings with exceptional accuracy.
skills: Good at perception, indicating a keen awareness of its environment.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its construct nature.
Immunities to several damage types including lightning, poison, and psychic damage.
Ability to deal double damage to objects as a siege monster.
Capable of grappling targets with its claws if they are Huge or smaller.
Can cause significant pressure in combat with the Arcane Barrage ability, forcing targets to consider their positioning.
spellcasting: Utilizes spells such as Lightning Bolt and has special abilities that deal damage based on its magical nature.
